pullrequest.title: Proposal: Updating to Visual Studio 2017 and improving Windows CI

content.raw:
Those branches are happy now:

- https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_windows/job/ignition_rndf-ci-default-windows7-amd64/38/
- https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_windows/job/ignition_transport-ci-default-windows7-amd64/119/

And the updated `ign-common` is still good with this:

- https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/ignition/job/ignition_common-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/339/
